Re @MinaProtocol One wallet will be used for teams but all all names in Name category.
There will be category input for each type of submission:
Dapp/Starter Kit/Tech Blog - If you only did one type, leave others blank.
Make sure you have your repos public, a solid ReadMe and licenses set MIT

- General language processing and text generation via GPT4
